**Government Tender Announcement: Brokerage Service for Warrants**
===========================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-249-1329033
**Solicitation Number:** ISED210008
**Publication Date:** 2024-03-01
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-15T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

**Notice Type:**
---------------

This tender notice is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) under the Government of Canada's contract award process.

**Trade Agreements:**
-------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity:**
---------------------------

The contract will be awarded in Ottawa.

**Contracting Entity Information:**
-------------------------------

* Contracting Entity: Innovation, Science and Economic Development (ISED)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Jordan Kearns
	+ Email: Jordan.Kearns@ised-isde.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (343) 548-6416
	+ Address: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H5

**Description of the Contract:**
------------------------------

Please refer to the attached contract document for a detailed description of the solicitation.

--------------
